presentation
Class Geometry

java.lang.Object
  presentation.Geometry

public class Geometry
extends java.lang.Object

A set of operations on 2D points and vectors including rotation, translation, subtraction, scaling, taking the norm and dot product of vectors and finding the midpoint of a cubic curve.

Author:
Helen Bretzke
